=Community=

Mrxvt has three mailing lists

  * materm-devel for development, bugs, etc: [http://sourceforge.net/mailarchive/forum.php?forum_name=materm-devel Archives] [http://lists.sourceforge.net/mailman/listinfo/materm-devel Subscribe]
  * materm-usage for usage questions [http://sourceforge.net/mailarchive/forum.php?forum_name=materm-usage Archives] [http://lists.sourceforge.net/mailman/listinfo/materm-usage Subscribe]
  * materm-commit for automatic notifications of commits to the subversion repository. [http://sourceforge.net/mailarchive/forum.php?forum=materm-commit Archives] [http://lists.sourceforge.net/mailman/listinfo/materm-commit Subscribe] 

The users list is very low traffic. Please revive it :).

There is also the [http://sourceforge.net/tracker/?group_id=114665 SourceForge.net] tracker system for feature requests, bugs, patches etc.

You can also contribute to this wiki. (Click [Contribute here] for details on how)
